<center>
### About me 
</center>
I am an Associate Professor of Statistics at the [Department of Statistical Sciences](https://dipartimenti.unicatt.it/scienze-statistiche-home) of [Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore](https://www.unicatt.it/en.html). I am currently based in Milan, Italy. My research focuses on applied statistics and statistical learning, with a particular emphasis on mixture modeling.

<center>
### Research interests
</center>

:::: {layout="[60, 40]"}
::: {#first-column}
* Mixture models
* Model-based clustering and classification
* Robust statistics
:::


::: {#second-column}
* Penalized estimation
* Variable selection
* Health Analytics
:::

### Breaking news

* [New article!](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00180-024-01564-4) Scoring probability maps in the basketball court with Indicator Kriging estimation (joint work with Carlesso, L. M., Manisera, M. and Zuccolotto, P.)
